Carlo Tacchini wrote:

> B2B is the latest type of U.S. stealth long-range bomber and the Merkava
> is the standard israeli battle tank.

Okay, this has gone far enough.

I formally request that the moderator step in and put an end to this now by
whatever means necessary, be it putting some posters on moderated status or
locking out.

This is really too much.

Tony
